title: go.talks/present: make play output resizable in browser
body:
This is a feature request.

For small output, the current default text pane for output from a play snippet is OK.
However, for some output it would be good to be able to resize the pane to avoid having
to scroll the pane. Currently this must be done statically and presentation-wide by
editing styles.css.

The ability to drag-resize the output pane up-left would make it possible to leave the
default and yet still view larger output without scrolling.

Would this change be considered?
